active.description: Indicates whether the contact is currently active

address.description: The physical address of the contact

company_id.description: The ID of the company the contact is associated with

description.description: A short description or summary about the contact

email.description: The email address of the contact

job_title.description: The job title or role of the contact

language.description: The preferred language of communication for the contact

mobile.description: The mobile phone number of the contact

name.description: The full name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

time_zone.description: The time zone applicable to the contact

twitter_id.description: Twitter handle or ID associated with the contact

custom_fields.description: Additional custom fields specific to the contact

facebook_id.description: Facebook ID linked to the contact

created_at.description: The timestamp when the contact was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the contact was last updated

csat_rating.description: Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) rating of the contact

preferred_source.description: The preferred source through which the contact interacts
